Table of Contents

Name

linx_get_version() - Retrieve the LINX version

Synopsis

#include <linx_types.h>
#include <linx.h>

int linx_get_version(char *buf);

Description

linx_get_version() is used to retrieve the LINX version. If buf is not NULL, the version is also converted to a string, "major.minor.patch", and placed in the user-supplied buffer pointed to by buf (which contains at least 14 bytes).

Return Value

On success, the version is returned. Bit 31 to 24 contains the major version, bit 23 to 8 contains the minor version and bit 7 to 0 contains the patch version.
On error, -1 is returned.

Errors

No errors are defined.

See Also

linx(7)

Author

Enea LINX team
